author: JumpingYang001
body: Numeric keypad typing 0123456789 will show pqrstuvwxy on Putty console

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Is this something to do with PowerShell?

comments.author: JumpingYang001
comments.body:
I don't know if PowerShell on Linux have something function about typing which cause this issue, just see this issue when typing on Putty console with PowerShell environment.
If PowerShell's typing function is correct, then it may be Putty's incompatible.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: It's PuTTY; all PowerShell does is read input from `System.Console`, so it must be receiving letters instead of numbers. This article on the [Vim wiki](http://vim.wikia.com/wiki/PuTTY_numeric_keypad_mappings) notes a similar problem due to PuTTY's "application keypad mode."

title: Numeric keypad typing 0123456789 will show pqrstuvwxy on Putty console
